name: Chyawanprash
description: A traditional herbal formulation made from a combination of herbs, fruits, and spices. It is known to boost immunity, improve vitality, and promote longevity.

name: Vallarai
description: A herb used in Siddha medicine to improve memory, cognitive function, and mental clarity. It is often used in the treatment of stress and anxiety.

name: Agasthiyar Kudineer
description: A Siddha herbal drink used to treat cold, cough, and respiratory issues. It is made from a mixture of herbs and is known for its cooling properties.

name: Karisalankanni
description: A plant used to treat liver ailments, improve digestion, and detoxify the body. It is also used for hair health and to promote growth.
